front.title: A YANG Data Model for SIMAP

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model for Service & Infrastructure Maps (SIMAP). It extends the RFC8345 YANG modules to support all SIMAP requirements. This document will only focus on modelling proposal for each of the requirements not supported by RFC8345. Any related terminology, concepts, use cases and requirements are defined outside of this draft and this draft will only refer to them, analyze how to model and propose the implementation solutions.
